commit message:
Fix positional paramters in strings.xml
Without specifiying the position of multiple %s paramters in each string,
the project won't build in Eclipse
Add necessary classpath entry for Eclipse.

Implement an action bar and move commonly used functions there. The action bar pattern is described in [1] and [2]. This implementation uses the small library at [3].

[1] http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/actionbar.html
[2] http://www.androidpatterns.com/uap_pattern/action-bar
[3] https://github.com/johannilsson/android-actionbar

Use the preferred way of creating dialogs for the status dialog.
This has several advantages, for details see http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/dialogs.html#ShowingADialog

Also move the dialog to its own file.

Clean up StatusMode code.
Use enums everywhere instead of enums, Strings and int constants.
Update home icon according to the status that is set.
Show connection status (progress bar) in action bar.

Add simple script to generate all icons for different sizes.
My bash skills are ... they suck. Can somebody improve this, please? :)
Add icons for all screen sizes.
Only show contact name in actionbar title of chat activity.
Update actionbar submodule with own fork.
Set status message in the subtitle of the roster actionbar.
Do not generate template icon and remove unused icon for add action.
Drawable-mdpi icons belong in drawable.
Fix state of toggle button for offline contacts visibility on app start
Don't show actionbar subtitle when status message is empty
Fix status message not showing in dialog.
Minor fix
Fix height of actionbar on 1.x devices
Update menu icons for offline contacts visibility; Fix menu
fix race condition in expanding groups
fix race condition in connect/disconnect thread
translation update
add roster groups to rosterprovider
store group names into a table
use rosterprovider in main window
fix roster group sort order
implement roster contentobserver to expand groups
main window: use showOffline for query
fix onDestroy broken by content observer
replace roster{Entry,Group}List with DB access
make roster groups virtual (use sqlite group by)
fix rosterprovider.infoLog
display roster from start on
remove unneeded MainWindow code
move more logic into roster list adaper
getRosterGroups from DB
remove deprecated RosterItem and (list based) ExpandableRosterAdapter
display 'offline' line when offline
unify functions
refactor roster callback
fix c&p error in service
re-add missing service callback (broken in 066bab65)
abuse connection error string for 'regular' status

work around bugs in android < 2.3

older SimpleCursorTreeAdapter require at least one group with at least
one child to not crash your application. Bummer! So now we are just
stealing gingerbread's SimpleCursorTreeAdapter to make it work on all
devices.
notify both roster and roster groups on any change
smackable: notify service when connected
allow uppercase JIDs
this variant requires API level 8. bummer.
